title: Docteur Justice (1975 Action film) with John Phillip Law, Gert Fröbe, Nathalie Delon

sources.title: Docteur Justice (1975 Action film) with John Phillip Law, Gert Fröbe, Nathalie Delon
sources.description:
Doctor Justice is a crusading physician with the World Health Organization and also a swimming champion, karate expert and philosopher must investigate a series of pirate attacks.

Teaser preview: https://youtu.be/kBcRoFYxLVQ

Original title: Docteur Justice (1975) AKA: Doctor Justice / Karate fighters
This film is available in French & German audio, and subtitled in many languages.

Director: Christian-Jaque
Writers: Christian-Jaque, Raphael Marcello 
Stars: John Phillip Law, Gert Fröbe, Nathalie Delon
Genres: French cinema, Action, Cult film


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:45 Mystery unfolds as a chef discovers salt instead of oil on a ship, leading to investigations and revelations.
06:52 Intrigue unfolds as Dr. Justice navigates a high-stakes situation involving a demanding individual and a conference in Bruges.
14:34 Mysterious doctor with martial arts skills gets involved in a dangerous situation and faces a cunning adversary.
21:13 Mysterious encounters and discussions unfold, leading to a planned visit to a fish farming center near the Dutch border.
27:37 Mysterious events unfold as Max receives a package and is asked for a large sum of money. Eric's involvement leads to dangerous consequences.
39:00 A doctor reveals secrets about a job involving a port city and a doctor's next task. Betrayal, revenge, and responsibility unfold.
50:38 Revelation of Max's dual identity as the gang leader and chef, implicating him in piracy activities.
55:00 Investigation leads to a mission in Colombia involving Max and Eric's revenge.
1:02:49 Mystery unfolds as Dr. Justice investigates suspicious activities on a ship, leading to unexpected revelations.
1:12:05 Undercover operation on a ship involving oil smuggling, negotiations, and a surprise plan.
1:30:11 Discovery of a dangerous plan involving a powerful serum and overpopulation prevention.
1:36:52 Plot summary of a French action film involving a mad scientist's plan to sterilize humanity using pollution and a heroic doctor's investigation.
